abstract: Apple has approved an iPhone application from Vonage that allows cheap phone calls over Wi-Fi and cellular voice networks. Meanwhile, a similar application from Google seems stuck in limbo.
snippet: Apple has approved an iPhone application from Vonage that allows cheap phone calls over Wi-Fi and cellular voice networks. Meanwhile, a similar application from Google seems stuck in limbo.
lead_paragraph: While the Google Voice application for the iPhone continues to be hung up in Apple‘s review process, a similar application from another company has passed with flying colors.

headline.main: Vonage Releases Calling Apps for iPhone and BlackBerry
